sources.title: Studio One - Plan For Escape
sources.description: This is episode 8 of season 5 Original Air Date 17 Nov 1952 Based on a Story by Violet Wolfson CAST Peggy Ann Garner Frank Overton Jean Carson Robert Webber Victor Thorley Anne Seymour Bruce Gordon Peter Gumeny Charles McClelland Joseph Sweeney Contains original Westinghouse Ads with Betty Furness.
